title: [Health] Lacking the recommended 7 hours of sleep per night could lead to more opportunities to make poor snack choices. Analysis of data on ~20,000 American adults linked not meeting sleep guidelines & eating more snack-related carbs, added sugar, fats & caffeine than those with at least 7 hrs of shut-eye.
[Epidemiology] Study of 500+ hospitalized newborns finds 23% colonized with Staphylococcus aureus; increased risk for infection and transmission
